metadata.dc:author: Povedano Gómez, J
García López, A
Parody Ruiz-Verdejo, R
Albornoz López, J
de la Iglesia Salgado, J L
metadata.dc:description: A description is given of four patients with the diagnosis of chronic graft-versus-host disease (cGVHD) who developed articular manifestations during the clinical course. One of the patients developed advanced lesions of scleroderma. The rheumatologic changes of the disease as well as other affections of organs, complications and prophylaxis are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Manifestaciones reumatológicas de la enfermedad injerto contra huésped crónica. A propósito de cuatro casos.
[Rheumatologic manifestations of chronic graft vs host disease. 4 case reports].
